post_message: A woman says Southwest Airlines refused to let her call her husband after she received a troubling text message shortly before her flight was scheduled to take off.  The woman said the text read, “Karen, please forgive me for what I am about to do, I am going to kill myself…” She said she replied "no" and immediately tried to call her husband, before a steward "slapped the phone down" and told her to put her phone on airplane mode.
